document.full_text: pietro ferrero, joint ceo of chocolate maker ferrero, died in an accident on monday, raising questions over the future strategy of the group, which had been linked to a possible bid for dairy giant parmalat.
document.title: italy's ferrero ceo dies in accident
lines_and_colors: pietro ferrero, joint ceo of chocolate maker ferrero, died in an accident on monday, raising questions over the future strategy of the group, which had been linked to a possible bid for dairy giant parmalat.
